select seq_cart.nextval from dual
insert into cart values(#{no},#{dto.memberNo},#{dto.productNo},#{dto.amount},current_timestamp)
mapper.select: select p.name product_name, sum(c.amount * p.price) buy_money from cart c inner join product p on c.productNo = p.no group by p.name order by product_name asc
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{jumunsu} where no=#{no}
